channel.title: Comments on: PASS Summit 2011: Reporting Services 201 Wrap-Up
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Marty Boley
item.dc:creator: Marty Boley
item.content:encoded:
Jes,
I was lucky enough to attend your, “From Basic to WOW!” session on Wed 10/12. Just wanted to applaud you on a great job. Your knowledge of the topic combined with plenty of enthusiasm made it my favorite session by far.

Thanks
Marty

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: Congrats on not combusting in front of everyone!
item.content:encoded: Congrats on not combusting in front of everyone!
